caption.p: The current fractional cover maps of Prosopis distribution were produced by using different machine learning algorithms. (a) generalized linear model (GLM), (b) gradient boosting machine (GBM), (c) gradient boosting machine using boosted regression trees package (GBM‚ÄêBRT), (d) random forest (RF), (e) support vector machine (SVM), (f) deep learning neural network (DNN), (g) ensemble model (ENS)
